title: Mononymous person
summary: A mononymous person is an individual who is known and addressed by a single name, or mononym.[lower-alpha 1][lower-alpha 2] In some cases, that name has been selected by the individual, who may have originally been given a polynym ("multiple name"). In other cases, it has been determined by the custom of the land[lower-alpha 3] or by some interested segment. In the case of historical figures, it may be the only one of the individual's names that has survived and is still known today.
